Text: The game doesn't start, just crashes with an error message. Does anybody else have the same problem?

It crashes for me too.
Appcrash
Fault module name: kernelbase.dll
Problem Solved: install Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 3.1

For anyone who is having problem running the game (like I was), simply search Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 3.1 in Google and install from the Microsoft website.

Game then works perfectly :-)
